description: This Java class 'DriverService' provides business logic for managing driver entities in a taxi booking backend system. It handles driver creation, retrieval by ID, listing of all or available drivers, and updating driver availability status. It interacts with repository interfaces to perform database operations and utilizes domain classes for Driver, Vehicle, and DriverStatus.

classes.name: DriverService
classes.description: Service class handling business logic for driver operations such as creation, retrieval, listing, and status updates.

methods.name: createDriver
methods.description: Creates and persists a new driver along with their vehicle based on the request data.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a driver by ID or throws NotFoundException if not present.

methods.name: listAll
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all drivers.

methods.name: listAvailable
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all drivers with status 'AVAILABLE'.

methods.name: updateAvailability
methods.description: Updates the availability status of an existing driver.
